tr.description:
A story-driven experience about two doctors traversing backwards through a dying man's memories to artificially fulfill his last wish.

ABOUT THIS GAME
Dr. Rosalene and Dr. Watts have peculiar jobs: They give people another chance to live, all the way from the very beginning... but only in their patients' heads.

Due to the severity of the operation, the new life becomes the last thing the patients remember before drawing their last breath. Thus, the operation is only done to people on their deathbeds, to fulfill what they wish they had done with their lives, but didn’t.

This particular story follows their attempt to fulfill the dream of an elderly man, Johnny. With each step back in time, a new fragment of Johnny's past is revealed. As the two doctors piece together the puzzled events that spanned a life time, they seek to find out just why the frail old man chose his dying wish to be what it is.

And Johnny's last wish is, of course... to go to the moon.

MORE DETAILS
"To the Moon", a story-driven RPG with pixel graphics, was originally developed six years ago for PC by Canadian producer Kan Gao and Freebird Games, his indie game studio.Rights to develop and publish the remastered mobile version of "To the Moon" were acquired by X.D. Network Inc.
The story of "To the Moon" unfolds before players, much like a movie. While the entire game has no battle system and can be completed in a few hours, the compelling story and moving original soundtrack resonated with players worldwide. On top of receiving overwhelmingly positive ratings, "To the Moon" received multiple awards from Gamespot, Metacritic, WIRED, and more, and was nominated for "I'm Not Crying, There's Something In My Eye" in the 2016 Steam Awards.

KEY FEATURES
•	Unlocked 29 new iMessage stickers.
•	Added "Music Box" function, allowing backstage music playing& in-game music downloading(will be enabled automatically after clearing the stage).
•	Added "DIY QR code" function, allowing one-key sharing of player data for playing on different devices.
•	A unique & non-combat story-driven experience
•	Innovative mix between adventure game elements and classic RPG aesthetics
•	Acclaimed original soundtrack that closely ties to the story
•	An espresso execution with zero filler and no time drains

tr.description:
ICEY is a 2D side-scrolling action game. As you follow the narrator's omnipresent voice, you will see through ICEY's eyes and learn the truth about her world. 

“Alright, you caught me! This ISN'T really just a simple 2D action game, and you WON'T be seeing through ICEY's eyes... NOR will you learn the truth about her world." says the narrator. 

“ICEY is a Meta game in disguise. The narrator will constantly urge you in one direction, but you must ask, "Why? Why am I following his directions? Why can't I learn the truth about this world and ICEY's purpose here?" Fight against his tyranny, and uncover what's really going on for yourself!

In fact, you can become ICEY, and let loose the shackles of your own identity. You are ICEY, and ICEY is you... if you want it that way. Feel free to keep hold of your own self, if you wish. 

Now Is the Time For You to Discover the Truth.

[FEATURES]

Fast-paced Combat: 
Crush enemies in the palm of your hand. 
Attack! Dodge! Counterattack! Do not hesitate. 
This is the only way to survive! 

Incredible Combos: 
With simple controls, amazing combos are easy to unleash, even for beginners. 
Every skill is special in its own way. Master your favorites and create your own fighting style!

tr.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

tr.description:
Moncage is a stunning vignette puzzle adventure developed by Optillusion. 

The game takes place inside a mysterious cube, with each side of the cube housing a unique world: be it an old factory, a light tower, an amusement park, or a church, etc. At first sight, they may seem random and unrelated, but upon closer look, you will become mesmerized by the subtle and intricate ways of how these worlds connect…  

【Solve Puzzles with Mind-Boggling Optical Illusions】
Use your imagination and spare no brain cells to find the connection and pinpoint every possible interaction between different sides of the cube, then watch as the magic unfold in front of you.

【Collect All Photos to Unveil the Story】
Behind the puzzles, there lies a story with a surprising twist for the player to uncover. Collect the photos from obscure corners and angles to reveal the underlying story, one photo at a time.

【Get Unstuck with Thoughtful Hints】
There is a multitude of guidance systems to help prevent players from getting stuck. Focus can be activated to highlight the key items to the solution, while hint texts are available to provide further clarity. And, if all else fails, video walkthroughs can be unlocked as the ultimate safety plan. 

【Prove Your Puzzle-Solving Skills with Medals】
There are a total of 15 achievements in the game, each corresponding with a Medal that has been crafted with a uniquely stunning design. A complete collection of the 15 Medals could be the perfect evidence to attest to your master puzzle-solving skills~

【Connect with us:】
Twitter: @MoncageTheGame

tr.description:
STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

tr.releaseNotes:
- New Daylight Summary notifications: See the day's duration, change from yesterday, and a gentle countdown to the next season. Fully customizable, scheduled at sunrise.
- Smart Scheduling lets you pause notifications during shorter or longer days.
- Improved localization across supported languages.
- And various UI/UX enhancements with bug fixes for a smoother experience.

Previously,

Lumy's OS 26 update is designed to feel lighter, smarter, and more in sync with daily life.

On iPhone and iPad
- Discover the new Liquid Glass design: UI elements feel gently illuminated, carrying a subtle echo of sunlight.
- New Peek Panel: A lightweight element that quietly shows simple info like "Moon above horizon." It fluidly expands to reveal more detail, such as "Sets in 20 min" when you need it, fading back automatically. Designed to balance presence and absence, it keeps information accessible without overwhelming the interface.
- A refreshed Bottom Bar with Quick Access Menu that morphs naturally with interaction, making it faster to switch modes or jump around the app.
- Make the Quick Access Menu your own by reordering modes — the first three are always at your fingertips.
- The new Season widget now lets you choose between astronomical or meteorological seasons.
- Updated widgets and app icons now match the new home screen's tinted and clear styles.
- And many thoughtful refinements across the app.

Foundation Model Features (iOS 26 + iPadOS 26)
- Mode-Specific Weather Insights: Smarter, activity-aware tips.
- State of Mind Suggestions: Personalized, context-aware guidance that adapts to your state of mind log.
- Astronomical Events: Tailored explanations that transform solar events into relevant insights for Photography, Hiking, Mindfulness, or Travel.
- Review System: A simple thumbs up/down or alternative request helps refine future insights, while keeping all data private on your device.

On Apple Watch
- Experience the new Liquid Glass design on your wrist.
- Quickly enable or disable sun event notifications right from Control Center.
- Add a configurable Season complication for astronomical or meteorological seasons.
- Added support for the latest iPhone 17 Series, iPhone Air, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and Apple Watch SE 3.

Thanks for being part of this journey. Your feedback continues to shape Lumy, and we'd love to hear your thoughts or suggestions at hello@waplestuff.com.
tr.description:
Lumy is a modern sun tracker + outdoor activities planner.

- Need perfect lighting for stunning photos or videos? Done.
- Planning a sunrise walk or sunset hike? Easy.
- Outdoor yoga or a sunshine break? Covered.

Whether you’re chasing golden hour, planning your daily dose of vitamin D, or keeping track of moon phases for stargazing, Lumy helps you make the most of natural light.

Now redesigned from the ground up - Lumy feels more personal, purposeful, and in sync with how we live. Inspired by sunlight filtering through a window, every view carries a subtle visual echo of light traveling through a pane of glass window.

Introducing Modes: Switch between profiles like Daily, Photography or Meditation to shape Lumy around your routine. See only what matters to you.

Lumy also supports iOS’s State of Mind feature, offering sun exposure suggestions based on mood entries from the Health app - a gentle nudge to step outdoors and connect with nature.

With seven-day weather forecasts, you can plan ahead with confidence. All sun and moon data is calculated entirely on-device, no tracking, no server requests. Only weather uses the internet.

Lumy works seamlessly across iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Apple TV, and HomePod. One purchase unlocks full access for your family.

Features:
- Modes: Switch profiles to suit your needs — from weekday planning to weekend golden hour.
- Sun + Moon Tracking: Accurate data, solar compass, and future predictions.
- Season Info: Displays both astronomical and meteorological seasons.
- Reminders: Customisable, repeatable notifications.
- Apple Watch: Complications, double-tap support, and Live Activities.
- Widgets + Control Centre: Quick access via Smart Stack and more.
- Interaction Upgrades: Time travel slider, Quick Access Button, fluid animations.
- Visual Feel: Simulated sunlight, shimmering glows, and improved Classic mode.
- Accessibility: VoiceOver, Dynamic Type, Reduce Motion, and more.
- Privacy First: Works fully offline (except weather). Your data stays private.
- Localised: Available in French, German, Japanese, and Chinese.

Lumy supports photographers, outdoor enthusiasts, and wellness seekers to stay in rhythm with the sun and moon.

*What’s Golden Hour?
Golden Hour (or Magic Hour) is the short time after sunrise or before sunset when the light is soft, warm, and perfect for taking beautiful photos or videos.

Sun Information Available:
Sunrise, Sunset, First Light, Last Light, Golden Hour, Blue Hour, Astronomical Twilight, Nautical Twilight, Civil Twilight, Solar Noon, Solar Midnight.

Moon Information Available:
Moonrise, Moonset, Altitude, Azimuth, Transit, Transit Elevation, Weekly Moon Phase, Next Full Moon, New Moon, First Quarter, Last Quarter.

Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you: hello@waplestuff.com

tr.description:
A new evolution of match-3, combat, and adventure!
Hero Emblems II is a JRPG that combines elements of side-scrollers and match-3 games. Players control members of the Night Chasers, a group of heroic warriors, as they embark on an adventure to save their lands from an evil threat.

[Game Features]
◆ Thrilling match-3 battle experiences
Match three Emblems to clear them from the board and make your heroes attack. Clear four or more to generate Magic Emblems, allowing your heroes to unleash powerful skills. Perform combos to launch even more powerful attacks and vanquish your enemies!

◆ Traditional JRPG experience
In a world of magic and swordplay, players will control members of the Night Chasers as they embark on an adventure together. Enter deep caves, explore ancient ruins, unlock treasure chests, fight against ferocious monsters, upgrade your equipment in town, and gain new information from villagers in the local taverns. A exciting RPG experience is waiting for you in Hero Emblems II!

◆ Substitute Heroes
Each Hero possesses their own unique skills and backstory. There's Zack, the Human Warrior; Lucien, the Marten Knight; Sid, the Felinian Black Mage; Abner the Bard, and many more! Lead your favorite heroes into battle!

◆ Thrilling Japanese character voices in battles
Personalized character voices make combat a thrilling, intense and fun experience!

◆ More equipment
Enemies attack with a wide range of debuffs such as Poison, Ignition, Petrification or Curses. To fight against these tough opponents, you will need to choose your Heroes'  weapons and armor carefully, and make good use of accessories to resist enemy debuffs and boost your Heroes' abilities!

◆'Food Consumption System' for Enhancing Battle Power
A hero's adventure is always brimming with all sorts of challenges. Vicious monsters boast tremendous strength and always catch people off guard with their varied attack styles. Now, heroes can boost their abilities by indulging in delightful delicacies, allowing them to thwart monster attacks with a more refreshing rhythm!

◆One-time payment, IAP-free, and ad-free


A New Chapter in the Night Chasers' History
A long time ago, there was a mercenary group known as the Night Chasers. Instead of making money, these heroic warriors went around helping those in need. During the war, they helped a great many people who were suffering under tyranny and injustice. However, in the ensuing age of peace, the Night Chasers were no longer needed, and were forced to disband. Years later, four young people - Zack, Lucien, Sid, and Odelia - decided to carry on their legacy, forming the new Night Chasers.

One day, Zack and his party save an Elven girl named Dolores. Suffering from amnesia, Dolores cannot remember why she has ventured so far from the Elven Kingdom – only that she has been sent on an urgent quest. Concerned for her well-being, the Night Chasers take her into their fold, leading them to discover an ancient and terrible threat to the kingdom...

** Recommend to use iPhone 6/iPad min4/iPad Air2/iPad 5th Gen./iPad Pro or later devices for better experiences.**

When FTL meets Foundation and Dune: Crying Suns is a tactical rogue-lite that puts you in the role of a space fleet commander as you explore a mysteriously fallen empire. tr.description:
HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

tr.description:
One of the best hack-and-slash games of all time now fits in your pocket!

Originally released on PC in 2006, Titan Quest is an action RPG set against a mythological backdrop. The Titans have escaped from prison and are hell-bent on destroying the Earth. The Gods alone can’t stop them -- a hero is needed to lead this epic struggle. Victory or defeat will determine humanity’s fate and that of the Olympians.

You are that hero! Create your character, explore ancient civilizations like Greece, Egypt, Babylon, and China, and fight against hordes of legendary creatures! Master the arts of archery, swordsmanship or magic and upgrade your character to unlock awesome powers! Discover special items to help you complete your quest: legendary swords, devastating thunderbolts, enchanted bows, and much more!

Specially adapted for mobile devices, this new version offers numerous new features:

● A new touch-friendly interface 
● Completely redesigned touch-friendly gameplay 
● High-quality graphics
● A huge, open world to explore
● Full day/night cycle
● 80 different mythological creatures: Minotaurs, Cyclopses, Gorgons, and many more
● 1200+ items to discover
● 30 different character classes 
● 150 different character skills
● Colossal playtime of more than 60 hours 
● Scalable difficulty modes:  weapons and enemies match your skill level 
● Dozens of unlockable achievements to discover
● No ads, no microtransactions. 

Mixing ancient mythology with non-stop action, Titan Quest is a classic hack-and-slash offering energizing gameplay with a fast, intense rhythm. Overcome thrilling challenges and vanquish the greatest enemies ever to invade the mobile world!

DLCs available as in-app purchase: 
● IMMORTAL THRONE - Encounter the greatest villains of Greek mythology, brave the attacks of Cerberus, and hazard the banks of the River Styx to conquer this dark new adventure.
● RAGNARÖK - In the uncharted lands of northern Europe, you’ll brave the realms of the Celts, the Northmen, and the Asgardian gods!
● ATLANTIS - Set out on a journey across the western Mediterranean, in search of the mythical kingdom of Atlantis. Including the Tartarus Arena for epic battles!
● ETERNAL EMBERS - Summoned by the legendary Emperor Yao, the Hero is called back into the East to deal with a demonic threat that has been ravaging the land after the Telkine was slain.

Build bridges, grow towers, terraform terrain, and fuel flying machines in the stunning followup to the multi-award winning World of Goo.

Discover realistic flowing, splashing, viscous liquid. Route the flow of liquid like a river, convert it into Goo Balls, extinguish fires, and solve puzzles.

WHAT STRANGE NEW CREATURES!
Discover new species of Goo: Jelly Goo, Liquid Launchers, Growing Goo, Shrinking Goo, Explosive Goo, and more. All with mysterious new properties.

IT SOUNDS LIKE…
World of Goo 2 has dozens of new musical tracks in a beautiful and haunting new soundtrack.

WELCOME TO…
A thrilling new story to explore over the course of 5 new chapters, bursting with over 60 new levels, each featuring additional challenges.

YOU ARE NOT ALONE...
A powerful company has re-branded as an environmentally friendly, sustainable, green, clean, Goo processing non-profit.Help them collect as much Goo as possible. But what do they really want? Explore a new story spanning hundreds of thousands of years and watch the world change.

LET’S SEE WHAT HAPPENS THIS TIME.
Be careful! The world is beautiful, but it is dangerous. Guide as many Goo Balls into the exit pipe of each area as you can. ...but what's on the other end of the pipe?

tr.description:
"Did you know that “Schadenfreude” is a German word defined as the concept of finding joy in someone else’s misfortune? It is also the main idea on which Neighbours back From Hell is built. A whole TV show based on playing increasingly outrageous pranks on your grumpy neighbor to keep the audience entertained, and viewership numbers high. It’s good to be bad in this early 2000s trash TV-inspired slapstick extravaganza! 

As Woody, the vengeful star protagonist of Neighbours back From Hell, you will prank your way through Seasons 1 and 2 of the fictitious, but aptly named TV show. Take the mischief from your nasty neighbor’s flat all the way to China, India, and Mexico where you will make sure his holiday is a living hell. While you’re at it, why limit targeting your antics at your neighbor, when you can involve his mother and fellow travelers? Whatever you decide to do, your trusty camera crew will be right there and keep a keen eye on all the action. You can let your crooked creativity flow freely and watch the neighbor rage in desperation. Just be mindful not to get caught by him or his companions, or they will whoop you good and your TV show will be taken off the air. If you perform well on the other hand, by creating more and more disarray and chaos in the neighbor’s life, ratings will increase, and you could win prestigious awards. "

Neighbours From Hell 1 & 2 Remastered in one package: 28 episodes set in the neighbor’s home, on a cruise liner, and in several different holiday locations around the world 

- All graphics newly rendered in Full HD 
- Framerate of all animations doubled for a smoother experience  
- Use stealth, skill, and style to perform the perfect ambush 
- Easy to use interface and controls 
- Superb cartoon-style graphics 
- Big band soundtrack 
- Game Center support
- Full controller support

The Squadron has reached your mobile device! Dodge a bullet storm and face fearsome aerial war machines! Lead your squadron to victory in two different campaigns, full of story twists and legendary boss fights!

ACES OF THE LUFTWAFFE - SQUADRON is an action-packed vertical scrolling shoot‘ em-up with a fascinating and fully voiced narrative. Dodge bullets, collect massive power-ups and wisely use special abilities to defeat your enemies. Two campaigns with 50 levels in total, waves of various deadly enemies and a lot of epic boss fights. Are you up to this task?

When Europe seemed to be free, a secret German commando called The Aces of the Luftwaffe took their chance to strike back and invade the USA! It’s your duty to restore peace and liberty aboard deadly wings of steel in bombastic air battles! However, every story has two sides. While the Aces of Luftwaffe begin their assault on the United States, you are charged with leading a squad of elite German pilots on a secret mission. tr.description:
Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

tr.description:
Become Japanese railroad companies and take on the world's busiest commuter rush!

No railroad knowledge is required to play "Tokyo Train 1".
This game is a brain game with simple rules but requires a lot of brain power.


Customers are waiting at the station for the trains to arrive to take them to their destinations.
Start the trains and transport your customers.

You will earn money for every passenger who boards a train.
Adjust the interval between runs and the number of cars to achieve the highest revenue.
Departing trains costs money. If you send out too many trains and the boarding rate drops, you will lose your revenue.

The operation method is very easy and the rules are simple.
All you have to do is adjust the number of train cars and make the trains depart at the best time.
As the game progresses, express fares will also appear.

No technical knowledge is required at all.
Both people who like trains and people who like games can quickly understand and enjoy the game.

There are no in-app purchases. There are no ads.
Please concentrate on the game.
Share your operating results on social media.

tr.description:
Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions.

Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world.

How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune.

Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff?

You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again!

Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you!

Pump it up and chill ;)

****************
Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

tr.description:
Drive trains and carry passengers on Japanese railway lines.

・Simple brain game
"Train Dispatcher!2" is a brain game with simple rules. No expertise required.
Train fans, game fans, everyone can enjoy it.

・To everyone who will become a train dispatcher
In the morning in Japan, customers are waiting for the arrival of the train to go to work.
Let's start the train and transport the customers.

・Goal of the game
Japanese railway companies are for-profit organizations. Let's aim for high operating profit!

・How to make profit
Fare revenue - Departure cost = Operating profit.

Fare revenue is generated when passengers board at a station.
Example) If two passengers board a train at a station with a fare of 20, the company receives 40.

Departure costs are charged according to the number of cars when the train departs.
Example) 30 for a 2-car train, 40 for a 4-car train, and 70 for a 10-car train.

One person can ride in one car.
Fare revenue is generated when customers board the train.
Adjust the driving schedule and the number of vehicles to aim for the highest profit.
Departure costs. If you run too many trains and the occupancy rate drops, you'll lose revenue.

・How to operate
The game is very easy to operate and the rules are simple.
All you have to do is adjust the number of train cars and make the trains depart at the best time.
As the game progresses, various variations such as express trains and transfer stations will appear.

・Volume
Enjoy over 50 routes.
Please experience the wide variety of transportation strategies of Japanese railway companies.
No ads, no charges.

・No ads, no billing
Please concentrate on the game. Children can also enjoy the game.
Share your results on Social Media.

・Train lines you can play with
JR East Japan JR Tokai JR West Japan JR Kyushu Tobu Tokyu Seibu Keio Keikyu Keihan Hankyu Hanshin Kintetsu Meitetsu Odakyu Nankai Seitetsu Sotetsu Keisei Tokyo Metro Osaka Metro Toei Subway Tsukuba Express

The storage burden is also small. There is no heavy processing at all.

This app plus your ears equals complete freedom in writing music!

pt.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

pt.releaseNotes:
The Last Warlord Official Version Patch 2.4.0 Update Notice on iOS（V1.1.7.4058）
The new updates as follow: (12/15 10:00 pm)
Core Features of Oath of Heaven
I. New Content:
1. Black Market System
   1. The Black Market system will regularly refresh with some rare items each quarter, which players can choose to purchase.
   2. The Black Market will sell a limited quantity of all recruitment resources each quarter, which players can choose to purchase.
   3. A challenge feature has been added to the Black Market. Players can select a Black Market item and challenge a Black Market NPC in either a ‘Duel’ or ’Hana Deck‘ format. Winning allows them to purchase the item at a 70% discount.
   4. All Black Market items are sold at a premium, with higher prices.
2. New Population Random Events
   1. Each round in the game, there is a chance of events occurring that affect population growth.
   2. These events may provide one-time population increases or decreases, or temporary population growth buffs or debuffs.
3. Added All Chapter 4 Quests
4. Added Some Chapter 4 Levels

II. Optimizations:
1. Adjusted items sold in the shop (added attribute fragments in Chapter 3).
2. Increased rewards for ‘Opening Granaries to Distribute Porridge,’ ‘Establishing Welfare Homes,’ and ‘Donating Troops Quests.’

III. Bug Fixes:
1. Fixed an error in the display of illusion spell text.
2. Fixed an error in the spawn position configuration of Hao Meng's troops in the Battle of Xiapi.
3. Fixed an issue where Chinese input on IOS could not be used normally.
4. Fixed an error where double-clicking the ‘Oath of Heaven’ button would sometimes cause the screen to go black.
pt.description:
"The End of Han Dynasty" requer que a versão do sistema seja iOS 16 e superior e use iPhone 7 ou 7Plus, iPhone 8 ou 8 Plus, iPhone X e superior, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 ou qualquer iPad Pro para jogar.


Introdução do jogo

"Três Reinos: Hegemonia no Fim da Dinastia Han" é um jogo SLG baseado em turnos cuidadosamente produzido pelo Longyou Tianxia Studio. É baseado principalmente no novo pensamento das pessoas e na nova perspectiva do jogo Três Reinos para criar um mundo diferente dos Três Reinos. Com base no retorno à categoria de estratégia tradicional, ele retrata profundamente as diferenças regionais entre as cidades dos três países e as semelhanças e diferenças das próprias capacidades e características de cada comandante militar. Em termos de combate, destaca o encanto de combinar a hora certa, o lugar certo e a implantação de pessoas.

Funcionalidades do jogo

Um: estilo clássico de bordado com desenho de linha branca, simples e elegante

As cabeças dos personagens adotam o estilo e a cor do bordado em linha branca da clássica história em quadrinhos "Romance dos Três Reinos". A interface do jogo adota o estilo antigo e o design com charme antigo, autêntico estilo chinês.


Dois: modo de gestão governamental simples e fácil de usar:

Arranjos básicos de assuntos internos, exploração de pessoal, reconhecimento militar e desenvolvimento de tecnologia adotam um modo de gerenciamento de posicionamento para reduzir operações tediosas e repetitivas e permitir que os jogadores se concentrem em outros eventos. No modo de jogo monarca, os jogadores só precisam prestar atenção à gestão da capital e do país. Outras cidades são entregues ao prefeito. Use a política para dar diferentes instruções militares e políticas para a subcidade.


Três: configurações de conteúdo de jogo extremamente ricas:

De 184 a 280 DC, mais de 1.300 generais (incluindo generais históricos e históricos) apareceram em cena.

As capacidades básicas de 30 generais são divididas e as capacidades dos generais são diferenciadas em detalhes.

Mais de 300 configurações independentes das características dos generais, totalmente destacar as diferenças individuais dos generais.

Existem mais de 500 itens e cenários de tesouro com evidências de pesquisa. Uma variedade de classificações é dividida para atender a diferentes preferências.

Quase mais de 60 tipos diferentes de cidades, mais de 200 características urbanas bem documentadas e produtos especiais.

Ricos itens de desenvolvimento técnico e suporte em todo o sistema de jogo. Reflete a importância da força científica e tecnológica.

As seis armas básicas e mais de uma dúzia de armas especiais constituem um rico sistema de armas.

Sistema super rico de cargos oficiais e títulos nobres.

O sistema de casamento apontado pelo monarca e o sistema de treinamento e herança infantil humanizado.

Vários fenômenos naturais e desastres de eventos simulam o período conturbado dos Três Reinos.

Muitas forças estrangeiras e bandidos e bandidos precisam de você para esmagá-los e eliminá-los.

Uma riqueza de visitas, mercadores, imortais, celebridades, médicos, mestres artesãos, espadachins vagam por aí, desencadeando vários eventos funcionais.


Quatro: Retorne ao sistema clássico de combate baseado em turnos, com foco na formação estratégica de tropas

A introdução do clima, topografia e alturas dos blocos destaca com mais destaque a influência dos fatores de tempo e localização na guerra.

pt.description:
Derrota o teu senhorio com uma slot machine neste roguelike de deckbuilding!

O teu senhorio está a bater na tua porta. Tens somente uma moeda na tua posse. Colocaste a moeda na tua slot machine...e... JACKPOT! Hoje, a sorte é que é o senhorio!

Luck be a Landlord é um roguelike de deckbuilding, em que tens que usar uma slot machine para ganhar dinheiro para a renda e derrotar o capitalismo. Este jogo não usa moedas de verdade para apostas nem microtransações.

Características:
152 Símbolos
227 Objetos
186 Proezas
20 Andares de Apartamento

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search!

Do you have trouble Looking for items?

Find your item quickly with "where I put it”!

Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings.

Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

《手机帝国》是一款以“造手机”为题材的高自由度单机模拟经营游戏。你扮演一名回到2001年的创业者，因为独到的眼光拿到了神秘投资人的启动资金，进而创立了一家可能改变世界的科技企业。游戏从2001年开始到2035年结束，你将从研发最早期的九宫格智能手机开始，一直到研发可完全独立使用的AR智能眼镜结束。在这35年时间里，你将亲历、见证、推动智能手机波澜壮阔的发展历程，并有机会把你的公司发展成为世界第一的科技企业。

•有深度的玩法
《手机帝国》的核心玩法是研发更好的图纸、升级更牛的科技、打造更强的团队、研发更好的手机、赚取更多的利润，如此循环。而“如何用人”是整个游戏的精髓所在，根据员工的能力、天赋和技能，把合适的员工放到合适的岗位才会发挥出其最大潜能。员工的配合还会触发团队突破效果，这是一个可以让你突破科技限制从而创造奇迹的新机制。

•海量的内容
你在游戏中可研发经典的九宫格手机、全键盘手机、早期触控手机、全面屏手机、折叠屏手机，甚至未来的AR智能眼镜，总共有超过100种手机外观供你研究。

•不断进阶的科技
游戏中的电池、屏幕、材质、相机等均可不断升级，在你资金充裕时甚至可以启动CPU和操作系统的自研项目，你将有可能研发出性能逆天的芯片来大幅提升自己的手机品质。

•新颖的竞争体验
你作为科技公司的CEO将与各个时期的科技巨头们展开竞争，你可以选择和他们搞好关系共谋发展，也可以为争夺优秀人才展开挖人大战。

•大量的随机事件
为了增加游戏的世界感，我们在游戏中融入了大量的随机事件，包括：世界事件、行业新闻、危机事件、幸运事件、员工事件、记者采访等等，甚至还包括比如太空电梯、火星登陆、AI大爆发等未来事件。

•独创的说服系统
为了更好的模拟现实生活中的人才招揽过程，我们在游戏中内置了一款小游戏，该游戏以古老的“九型人格”为原型，玩家需要根据招募对象的不同人格类型，采用不同的沟通技巧和策略来说服对方。越是顶级的人才，说服的难度越高。

•更多等待你探索的内容
游戏中还包括信用评级、企业并购、情报系统、员工培养、公司战略等其他好玩的元素等待你来探索。

支持语言:
*简体中文 (Simplified Chinese)
*繁体中文 (Traditional Chinese)
*English

操作系统

推荐配置

存储空间：1.5GB

pt.description:
Juicy Realm is a roguelike game with fruits as enemies. It is set in a world in which the line between animals and plants is blurred. It began with the tipping of the food-chain, which forced the humans to establish an outpost and begin an investigation in the region where the first species of mutated plants was discovered. The military has prepared a vast number of powerful weapons, with you leading the vanguard forces to wage this long war.

Subverted Order
“Many years later, when the humans watch as the plants climb up to the top of the food chain, they will be reminded of their own naivety and arrogance…”
Only when all the plants started to evolve into animals, growing limbs and becoming sentient, did the humans realize the threat of those photosynthetic-lifeforms. No one knows how they achieved the state of evolution that took animal lifeforms millions of years to reach in such a short amount of time, and no one knows their ultimate objective. The only thing known for sure is that the humans now face the greatest challenge since they climbed up to the top of the food chain.

Gameplay
As the first explorers of this unknown region, you must strive to venture deep into the enemy hive, defeat all kinds of fruits and arm yourself with various equipment, as well as upgrade yourself with the resources you find in your way.

Game Features
-Rougelite elements such as random terrains, loot drops, and monsters
-Hundreds of special and bizarre weapons and items
-Loads of unique mod enemies and bosses
-10 characters in the roster with unique skills and abilities
-Unique artstyle with rich details

Twitter: /@JuicyRealm
Facebook: @JuicyRealm
Press contact: juicyrealm@spacecangames.com

[Minimum Requirements]

Please make sure you are using devices matching the following requirements. If you are using old devices, the game might not run normally on your device.

iPhone 6S and higher
iPad Air 2 and higher
iPad Mini 4 and higher

Uma história sobre a viagem de dois doutores através das memórias de um homem moribundo, de modo a realizar artificialmente o seu último desejo.

Mais detalhes
A história de "To the Moon" revela-se diante dos jogadores, assim como um filme. Enquanto o jogo completo não tem sistema de batalha e pode ser finalizado em algumas horas, a atraente história e a trilha sonora original tocante ressoa com os jogadores em todo o mundo. Além de receber grandes classificações positivas, "To the Moon" ganhou muitos prêmios da Gamespot, Metacritic, WIRED, e muito mais, e foi nomeado para "I'm Not Crying, There's Something In My Eye" nos Prêmios Steam de 2016.
"To the Moon", um RPG baseado em história com gráficos em pixels, foi originalmente desenvolvido há seis anos para PC pelo produtor canadense Kan Gao e pela Freebird Games, seu estúdio de jogos indie. Os direitos de desenvolver e publicar a versão móvel remasterizada de "To the Moon" foram adquiridos pela X.D. Network Inc.

Sobre este jogo
Os doutores Rosalene e Watts têm trabalhos peculiares, eles oferecem a chance de viver outra vez, tudo dentro da mente dos seus pacientes.

Devido a seriedade da operação, a nova vida torna-se na última coisa de que os pacientes se lembram antes de respirarem uma última vez. Assim, a operação só é aplicada a pessoas em estado terminal, pare que possam experienciar o que sempre quiseram, mas não conseguiram.

Esta história particular segue a tentativa de completar o sonho de Johnny, um homem idoso. Ao recuarem na sua memória, novos fragmentos do seu passado se vão relevados. Ao unir os acontecimentos da sua vida, os dois doutores procuram descobrir a razão por detrás do seu último pedido.

E o último desejo de Johnny é, claro… ir para a lua.

CARACTERÍSTICAS CHAVE
•Desbloquear 29 novas tags imessage
•Nova função de música. Suporta música de fundo. Baixar músicas para o jogo (abre automaticamente após finalizado)
•Novo DIY
Função de Compartilhamento de Código. Clique e compartilhe com amigos em qualquer lugar."
•Uma experiência única que não se baseia no combate, revolvendo à volta da história.
•Uma mistura inovativa de elementos de jogos de aventura com o estilo estético de RPGs clássicos.
•Uma soundtrack original reconhecida criticamente que se liga intimamente à historia. 
•Uma execução rápida sem perdas de tempo ou esperas inúteis.

pt.description:
ICEY is a 2D side-scrolling action game. As you follow the narrator's omnipresent voice, you will see through ICEY's eyes and learn the truth about her world. 

“Alright, you caught me! This ISN'T really just a simple 2D action game, and you WON'T be seeing through ICEY's eyes... NOR will you learn the truth about her world." says the narrator. 

“ICEY is a Meta game in disguise. The narrator will constantly urge you in one direction, but you must ask, "Why? Why am I following his directions? Why can't I learn the truth about this world and ICEY's purpose here?" Fight against his tyranny, and uncover what's really going on for yourself!

In fact, you can become ICEY, and let loose the shackles of your own identity. You are ICEY, and ICEY is you... if you want it that way. Feel free to keep hold of your own self, if you wish. 

Now Is the Time For You to Discover the Truth.

[FEATURES]

Fast-paced Combat: 
Crush enemies in the palm of your hand. 
Attack! Dodge! Counterattack! Do not hesitate. 
This is the only way to survive! 

Incredible Combos: 
With simple controls, amazing combos are easy to unleash, even for beginners. 
Every skill is special in its own way. Master your favorites and create your own fighting style!

Massive Cyborg Bosses: 
Can you withstand the onslaught of attacks from terrifying cyborg bosses? 
Every boss unleashes flurries of different attacks. It's up to you to find their weak spots and tear them apart!

[Awards]
-Nominated, Tokyo Game Show 2016 DENGEKI PlayStation Best Indie Game
-Official Selection, 2016 Gamescom Indie Arena Booth 
-Most Promising Game 2nd Prize, Taipei Game Show 2016 
-Official Selection, Casual Connect Asia 2016 
-Official Selection, IGF China 2015 
-Best Technology Award, Indieplay 2015

Operating system 
iOS: version 8.0 or higher 

Recommended configuration 
RAM: 2 GB or more 
Storage: 1.2 GB (iOS) 

Tips 
- As gameplay smoothness and reliability are affected by screen resolution and the number of applications running in the background, you can adjust the image quality option to achieve balance between image, smoothness and power consumption. 

- Added MFi controller support

Languages Supported:
*English
*Francais
*Español
*简体中文 (Simplified Chinese)
*繁体中文 (Traditional Chinese)

Twitter:@ICEYtheGame
Service Email: ICEY@xindong.com

pt.description:
Fuja dos seus medos de infância

Disponível primeiramente para PC e consoles, o conto de aventuras de terror Little Nightmares agora está disponível para dispositivos móveis!
Mergulhe em Little Nightmares, um conto sombrio e extravagante que confrontará você com seus medos de infância!
Ajude Six a escapar da Bocarra, um navio vasto e misterioso habitado por almas corrompidas em busca da próxima refeição.
Conforme você avança na jornada, explore a casa de bonecas mais perturbadora que oferece uma prisão de onde fugir e um parquinho cheio de segredos para descobrir.
Reconecte-se com sua criança interior para soltar a imaginação e encontrar a saída!
Little Nightmares apresenta uma mistura sutil de ação, mecânica de plataforma e quebra-cabeças enraizada em uma direção artística misteriosa e design de som assustador.
Esgueire-se para fora do labirinto sombrio da Bocarra e fuja dos habitantes corrompidos para fugir dos seus medos de infância.

RECURSOS

- Ande com cuidado em uma aventura obscura e emocionante
- Redescubra seus medos de infância dentro de uma embarcação assombrada e escape dos habitantes misteriosos dela
- Escale, rasteje e esconda-se em ambientes horripilantes para solucionar enigmas difíceis de plataforma
- Mergulhe na Bocarra com o design de som assustador

REDESENHADO CUIDADOSAMENTE PARA DISPOSITIVOS MÓVEIS

- Interface nova
- Conquistas do Game Center
- iCloud - Compartilhe o progresso entre dispositivos iOS
- Compatível com controles MFi

Fuja dos seus medos de infância

Caso tenha algum problema, entre em contato conosco em https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ com o máximo de informações possível sobre o problema.

Moncage is a stunning vignette puzzle adventure developed by Optillusion. 

The game takes place inside a mysterious cube, with each side of the cube housing a unique world: be it an old factory, a light tower, an amusement park, or a church, etc. At first sight, they may seem random and unrelated, but upon closer look, you will become mesmerized by the subtle and intricate ways of how these worlds connect…  

【Solve Puzzles with Mind-Boggling Optical Illusions】
Use your imagination and spare no brain cells to find the connection and pinpoint every possible interaction between different sides of the cube, then watch as the magic unfold in front of you.

【Collect All Photos to Unveil the Story】
Behind the puzzles, there lies a story with a surprising twist for the player to uncover. Collect the photos from obscure corners and angles to reveal the underlying story, one photo at a time.

【Get Unstuck with Thoughtful Hints】
There is a multitude of guidance systems to help prevent players from getting stuck. Focus can be activated to highlight the key items to the solution, while hint texts are available to provide further clarity. And, if all else fails, video walkthroughs can be unlocked as the ultimate safety plan. 

【Prove Your Puzzle-Solving Skills with Medals】
There are a total of 15 achievements in the game, each corresponding with a Medal that has been crafted with a uniquely stunning design. A complete collection of the 15 Medals could be the perfect evidence to attest to your master puzzle-solving skills~

【Connect with us:】
Twitter: @MoncageTheGame
Email: moncagethegame@gmail.com
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/TEVX2uPEsj

STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

Gerçekler karanlıkta kalmaz…
İstanbul’un sokakları, tarihi yapıları ve karanlık sırları arasında geçen bu dedektiflik bulmacasında, her bölüm yeni bir vakayı çözmek için seni bekliyor.

Delil Zinciri, bölüm bölüm ilerleyen, şüphelileri sorguladığın ve kanıtları bir araya getirerek gizemi çözdüğün sürükleyici bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Oyunun kalbinde kart temelli sorgulama sistemi bulunuyor:

Tanıkları çapraz sorguya al,
Arşivleri tarayarak bilgi topla,
Özel araçlar ile izleri bul,

pt.description:
A new evolution of match-3, combat, and adventure!
Hero Emblems II is a JRPG that combines elements of side-scrollers and match-3 games. Players control members of the Night Chasers, a group of heroic warriors, as they embark on an adventure to save their lands from an evil threat.

[Game Features]
◆ Thrilling match-3 battle experiences
Match three Emblems to clear them from the board and make your heroes attack. Clear four or more to generate Magic Emblems, allowing your heroes to unleash powerful skills. Perform combos to launch even more powerful attacks and vanquish your enemies!

◆ Traditional JRPG experience
In a world of magic and swordplay, players will control members of the Night Chasers as they embark on an adventure together. Enter deep caves, explore ancient ruins, unlock treasure chests, fight against ferocious monsters, upgrade your equipment in town, and gain new information from villagers in the local taverns. A exciting RPG experience is waiting for you in Hero Emblems II!

◆ Substitute Heroes
Each Hero possesses their own unique skills and backstory. There's Zack, the Human Warrior; Lucien, the Marten Knight; Sid, the Felinian Black Mage; Abner the Bard, and many more! Lead your favorite heroes into battle!

◆ Thrilling Japanese character voices in battles
Personalized character voices make combat a thrilling, intense and fun experience!

◆ More equipment
Enemies attack with a wide range of debuffs such as Poison, Ignition, Petrification or Curses. To fight against these tough opponents, you will need to choose your Heroes'  weapons and armor carefully, and make good use of accessories to resist enemy debuffs and boost your Heroes' abilities!

◆'Food Consumption System' for Enhancing Battle Power
A hero's adventure is always brimming with all sorts of challenges. Vicious monsters boast tremendous strength and always catch people off guard with their varied attack styles. Now, heroes can boost their abilities by indulging in delightful delicacies, allowing them to thwart monster attacks with a more refreshing rhythm!

◆One-time payment, IAP-free, and ad-free


A New Chapter in the Night Chasers' History
A long time ago, there was a mercenary group known as the Night Chasers. Instead of making money, these heroic warriors went around helping those in need. During the war, they helped a great many people who were suffering under tyranny and injustice. However, in the ensuing age of peace, the Night Chasers were no longer needed, and were forced to disband. Years later, four young people - Zack, Lucien, Sid, and Odelia - decided to carry on their legacy, forming the new Night Chasers.

One day, Zack and his party save an Elven girl named Dolores. Suffering from amnesia, Dolores cannot remember why she has ventured so far from the Elven Kingdom – only that she has been sent on an urgent quest. Concerned for her well-being, the Night Chasers take her into their fold, leading them to discover an ancient and terrible threat to the kingdom...

** Recommend to use iPhone 6/iPad min4/iPad Air2/iPad 5th Gen./iPad Pro or later devices for better experiences.**

pt.description:
When FTL meets Foundation and Dune: Crying Suns is a tactical rogue-lite that puts you in the role of a space fleet commander as you explore a mysteriously fallen empire. In this story rich experience inspired by Dune and Foundation, each successful run will uncover the truth about the Empire... and yourself as well.

Main Features:
- Space exploration in a procedurally-generated universe
- Tactical fights between battleships and their squadron fleets
- More than 300 possible story events
- A deep and dramatic storyline structured in 6 chapters
- A dark and disturbing atmosphere inspired by our favorite S-F universes (Foundation, Dune, Battlestar Galactica)

First released on PC and Mac, the indie hit Crying Suns was carefully redesigned for mobile and tablets, including a revamped interface and intuitive touchscreen interactions.

Pay once to get the full Crying Suns experience! No ads, no F2P mechanics! All future updates included.

Supported languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, and Japanese

If you encounter any problem, please contact us at contact@cryingsuns.com with as much information as possible on the issue.

HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

pt.description:
Um dos melhores jogos de corta e massacra (hack-and-slash) agora no seu celular!

Originalmente lançado para PC em 2006, Titan Quest é um RPG de ação em um cenário mitológico. Os Titãs escaparam da prisão e estão determinados em destruir a Terra. Os Deuses não conseguem impedi-los e será necessário um herói para liderar essa luta épica. A vitória ou a derrota determinarão o destino da humanidade e dos olimpianos.

Você é esse herói! Crie o seu personagem, explore civilizações antigas como Grécia, Egito, Babilônia e China, e lute contra hordas de criaturas lendárias! Domine as artes de arco e flecha, esgrima ou magia e melhore seu personagem para destravar poderes incríveis! Descubra itens especiais para ajudá-lo a completar a sua missão: espadas lendárias, raios devastadores, arcos encantados e muito mais!

Especialmente adaptado para dispositivos móveis, esta versão oferece novos recursos:
● Jogue sem anúncios!
● Uma nova interface sensível ao toque
● Jogabilidade sensível ao toque completamente redesenhada
● Gráficos de alta qualidade
● Um mundo enorme e disponível para explorar
● Ciclo dia/noite completo
● 80 criaturas mitológicas diferentes: Minotauros, Ciclopes, Górgonas e muito mais
● 1200+ itens para descobrir
● 30 classes de personagem diferentes
● 150 habilidades de personagem diferentes 
● Hora da diversão colossal com mais de 60 horas 
● Modos de dificuldade escalável: as armas e os inimigos correspondem ao seu nível de habilidade 
● Dezenas de conquistas desbloqueáveis para descobrir 
● Sem anúncios, sem microtransações.

Misturando mitologia antiga com ação ininterrúpta, o Titan Quest é um clássico jogo de corta e massacra que oferece um ritmo rápido e intenso. Supere os desafios emocionantes e derrote os maiores inimigos de todos os tempos que estão tentando invadir o mundo dos dispositivos móveis!

DLCs disponíveis como compra in-app: 
● IMMORTAL THRONE - No DLC do Trono Imortal, você encontrará os maiores vilões da mitologia grega, enfrentará os ataques de Cerberus e se arriscará nas margens do Rio Styx. Você deve interpretar as profecias do vidente cego Tirésias, lutar ao lado de Agamenon e do Aquiles, além de usar os ardis de Odisseu para conquistar esta nova aventura sombria.
● RAGNARÖK - Nas terras desconhecidas do norte da Europa no Ragnarök DLC, você enfrentará os reinos dos celtas, dos homens do norte e dos deuses Asgardianos!
● ATLANTIS - Conheça um explorador no DLC de Atlantis e embarque em busca deste reino mítico. A chave está supostamente escondida no diário de Hércules. Dizem que o diário está localizado na cidade fenícia de Gadir. Comece uma jornada pelo Mediterrâneo Ocidental, incluindo a Arena do Tártaro para batalhas épicas!
● ETERNAL EMBERS - Invocado pelo lendário Imperador Yao, o Herói é chamado de volta ao Leste para lidar com uma ameaça demoníaca que está devastando a terra depois que o Telkine foi morto.

pt.description:
Construa pontes, erga torres, molde terrenos e abasteça máquinas voadoras na sequência estonteante de World of Goo.

Descubra um líquido viscoso que flui e se espalha de forma realista. Direcione o fluxo do líquido como um rio, converta-o em Bolas de Gosma (Goo Balls), apague incêndios e solucione quebra-cabeças.

QUE CRIATURAS NOVAS MAIS ESTRANHAS!
Descubra novas espécies de Gosma: Jelly Goo (Gosma Gelatinosa), Liquid Launchers (Lançador de Líquido), Growing Goo (Gosma Crescente), Shrinking Goo (Gosma Encolhedora), Explosive Goo (Gosma Explosiva) e muito mais. Todos com novas propriedades misteriosas.

PARECE QUE...
World of Goo 2 tem dezenas de novas faixas musicais em uma bela e assombrosa trilha sonora.

BOAS-VINDAS A...
Uma nova história emocionante para explorar ao longo de 5 novos capítulos abarrotados com mais de 60 fases novas, cada uma trazendo desafios adicionais.

NINGUÉM ESTÁ SOZINHO...
Uma empresa poderosa se converteu em uma organização sem fins lucrativos de processamento de Gosma que é sustentável, verde, limpa e ecologicamente correta. Mas o que eles querem de verdade? Explore uma nova história que abrange centenas de milhares de anos e observe o mundo mudar.

VAMOS VER O QUE ACONTECE DESSA VEZ.
Tenha cuidado! O mundo é belo, mas também perigoso. Direcione o maior número de Goo Balls possível para o cano de saída de cada área. ... mas o que tem do outro lado do cano?

pt.description:
"""Você sabia que “Schadenfreude” é uma palavra alemã para definir o conceito de encontrar alegria no infortúnio de outra pessoa? É também a ideia principal do jogo Vizinhos do Inferno. Um programa de TV baseado em pegadinhas cada vez mais ultrajantes contra seu vizinho mal-humorado. Tudo para manter o público entretido e o número de visualizações alto. Ser mau é algo bom nessa extravagância de palhaçada inspirada na TV do início dos anos 2000! 

Como o Woody, o protagonista vingativo do Vizinhos do Inferno, você vai fazer pegadinhas através das temporadas 1 e 2 do fictício, mas apropriadamente chamado programa de TV. Faça travessuras do apartamento do seu vizinho desagradável até a China, Índia e México, onde você garantirá que as férias dele sejam um inferno. Já que você está dedicado em fazer isso, por que limitar suas travessuras em um vizinho, quando você pode envolver a mãe dele e outros viajantes? Não importa o que você deseja fazer, sua confiável equipe de filmagem estará lá, pronta para toda a ação. Você pode deixar sua criatividade fluir livremente e ver o vizinho se enfurecer em desespero. Apenas tome cuidado para não ser pego por ele ou seus companheiros. Se isso acontecer, eles vão gritar com você e seu programa de TV será tirado do ar. Por outro lado, se você tiver um bom desempenho, criando mais desordem e caos na vida do vizinho, as avaliações irão aumentar e você poderá ganhar prêmios de prestígio. ""

O Vizinhos do Inferno 1 e 2 remasterizado em um pacote: 28 episódios ambientados na casa do vizinho, em um cruzeiro e em vários locais de férias ao redor do mundo

- Todos os gráficos recém-renderizados em Full HD
- Para uma experiência mais suave, as taxas de quadros de todas as animações foram dobradas
- Use a discrição, habilidade e estilo para realizar uma emboscada perfeita
- Interface e controles fáceis de usar
- Excelentes gráficos em estilo de desenho animado
- Trilha sonora de uma grande banda 
- Suporte total ao controlador
- Compatível com Game Center!

© HandyGames

pt.description:
O esquadrão chegou ao teu dispositivo móvel! Evita uma tempestade de balas e enfrenta temíveis máquinas de guerra aéreas! Lidera o teu esquadrão até à vitória em duas campanhas diferentes, repletas de reviravoltas na história e combates  com chefes lendários!

ASES DA LUFTWAFFE - ESQUADRÃO é um jogo de tiros de rolagem vertical repleto de ação com uma narrativa fascinante e totalmente falada. Desvia-te de balas, recolhe power-ups massivos e usa sabiamente habilidades especiais para derrotares os teus inimigos. Duas campanhas com 50 níveis no total, ataques de vários inimigos mortais e muitas lutas épicas contra chefes. Estás preparado para a tarefa?

Quando a Europa parecia estar livre, um comando secreto alemão chamado Os Ases da Luftwaffe teve a oportunidade de se vingar e invadir os EUA! É teu dever restaurar a paz e a liberdade a bordo de asas mortais de aço em batalhas aéreas bombásticas! No entanto, qualquer história tem dois lados. Enquanto os Ases da Luftwaffe começam o seu ataque aos Estados Unidos, tu és encarregado de liderar um esquadrão de pilotos alemães de elite numa missão secreta. Entra numa aventura aérea épica de intrigas e rasteiras com uma base secreta no Triângulo das Bermudas. Escolhe o teu lado, decide o teu papel e descola!

- Jogo de tiros com efeitos especiais explosivos
- Asas NPC heroicos que seguirão as tuas ordens
- Árvores de habilidades com perícias individuais para cada asa
- Sistema de conquistas desafiante
- Enredo cativante com personagens que falam
- 50 níveis e missões emocionantes
- 12 espetaculares lutas contra chefes
- Banda orquestral sonora épica, semelhante a um filme

pt.description:
Vivencie as batalhas da Segunda Guerra Mundial neste novo jogo de guerra!

A batalha continua após o "1941 Frozen Front" - e desta vez, tudo gira em torno de batalhas navais! Entre para a Marinha e lute para vencer a maior batalha da sua vida! Conquiste o campo de batalha e envie seus soldados para a linha de frente. O melhor do combate militar! Escolha as melhores táticas e utilize seu esquadrão para derrotar o inimigo! Lidere o exército dos EUA em sua campanha ou comande as forças japonesas em sua missão! Elimine as alianças inimigas com infantaria, artilharia, tanques, aviões de combate, fragatas e submarinos, e ganhe suas patentes por ser um comandante habilidoso no FRONT DO PACÍFICO!

*** DESCRIÇÃO DA MISSÃO ***

BATALHE com armas poderosas como torpedos e bombas!
ELIMINE posições inimigas com tanques e infantaria!
BOMBARDEIE quartéis generais inimigos com poderosos bombardeiros!
SURPREENDA o inimigo com ataques de seus submarinos
POSICIONE sua artilharia em terrenos acidentados!
LIBERE praias, lagos e estreitos!
PREPARE EMBOSCADAS para o inimigo!
ABASTEÇA seu exército com suprimentos e munição!
DEFENDA seus porta-aviões e suas fragatas!

Recursos:
- Jogue sem anúncios!
- Jogo de ação e estratégia em rodadas, no ambiente da 2ª Guerra Mundial
- Campanhas eletrizantes e missões desafiadoras
- Unidades históricas dos EUA e do Japão
- Infantaria, artilharia, tanques, caças, fragatas e submarinos nas duas alianças
- Reparos, camuflagem e fortificação de unidades durante as batalhas
- Batalhas multiplayer hot-hand
- Mapa hexagonal para proporcionar a melhor perspectiva possível
- Gráficos detalhados e efeitos sonoros super realistas

Obrigado por jogar o "1942 Pacific Front"!


© www.handy-games.com GmbH

pt.description:
Unimos elementos de jogos de carta e roguelike para criar o melhor jogo solo de baralho que pudemos! Monte um baralho único, encontre criaturas bizarras, descubra relíquias com imenso poder e prove-se em Slay The Spire!

Recursos:

- Montagem de baralho dinâmica: escolha suas cartas com sabedoria! Descubra centenas de cartas para adicionar ao seu baralho a cada tentativa de subir o Spire. Selecione cartas que funcionam bem em conjunto para eliminar inimigos com eficiência e chegar ao topo.
- Um Spire em mudança constante: toda vez que embarcar em uma aventura no Spire, a configuração dele se modifica. Escolha um caminho arriscado ou seguro, enfrente inimigos e escolha cartas diferentes, descubra novas relíquias - pode até lutar contra chefes diferentes!
- Relíquias poderosas para descobrir: itens poderosos, conhecidos como relíquias, podem ser encontrados no Spire. Os efeitos dessas relíquias podem melhorar consideravelmente o seu baralho a partir de interações poderosas.

pt.description:
小猫补光灯Pro：自拍版是一款专业的自拍补光工具，让你的自拍更出彩！

在小红书姐妹们的疯狂要求下，已逐步增加以下功能：
1. 自拍镜像，你可以找到自己美的任何角度
2. 直出live，轻松get动态的美
3. 延时拍摄，再也不用慌慌张张，急急忙忙地拍了
4. 录像，非常建议先录像再截图，不错过自己任何一瞬间的美
5. 翻转摄像头，后置摄像头虽然无法补光，但是可以美美对镜自拍哦


主要功能：
• 8种精心调校的专业预设光效
• 360度全色彩自由调节
• 精确的亮度控制系统
• 智能屏幕亮度调节
• 便捷的相机预览功能
• 支持音量键快速拍摄
• 简洁直观的操作界面

为什么选择小猫自拍：
1. 专业级补光效果：精心调校的预设光效，满足各种场景需求
2. 灵活的自定义：支持自由调节色相、亮度，打造专属光效
3. 便捷的操作：左右滑动快速切换光效，音量键快速拍摄
4. 实时预览：内置相机预览，即时查看补光效果
5. 优雅的界面：简洁直观的设计，操作便捷

适用场景：
• 自拍美颜
• 直播补光
• 化妆镜使用
• 视频会议补光

无论是自拍达人还是博主，小猫补光灯Pro都能帮你轻松获得专业级的补光效果！

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.
